title: Reporting an Issue to the Landlord

content.text: In this lesson, you will call your landlord (*huisbaas*) because the heating is broken. Your goal is to explain the problem and get help as soon as possible.

content.title: Stating the Problem
content.setting: You are calling your landlord. You need to introduce yourself and state the main problem.

conversation_flow.title: Introduce yourself and state your address.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Goedemiddag, u spreekt met de huisbaas.

conversation_flow.title: Tell him the heating is broken.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ah, goedemiddag. Ik heb uw adres. Wat is het probleem?

content.title: Describing the Situation
content.setting: The landlord knows the heating is broken. Now, give more details.

conversation_flow.title: Say there is no warm water.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oké, de verwarming is kapot. Is er nog iets?

conversation_flow.title: Say it is very cold.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Geen warm water. Begrepen. En de temperatuur in huis?

content.title: The Urgency Mismatch
content.setting: You have explained the problem. Now you need to know when it will be fixed.

conversation_flow.title: Ask when the mechanic can come.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Vervelend. Ik moet een monteur bellen.

conversation_flow.title: Say that is too late.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Even kijken... misschien morgen of overmorgen.

data.phrase: Kan er vandaag iemand komen, alsjeblieft?

content.title: Emphasizing Urgency
content.setting: The landlord's timeline is too slow. You need to explain that the problem is urgent.

conversation_flow.title: Say it is an urgent problem.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Te laat? De monteurs hebben het erg druk.

conversation_flow.title: Ask if someone can please come today.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oké, oké, ik begrijp het. U heeft gelijk.

data.meaning: Okay, the mechanic will call me.

content.title: Securing an Appointment
content.setting: The landlord has agreed to act today. Confirm the final details.

conversation_flow.title: Confirm that the mechanic will call you.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Goed. Ik vraag de monteur om u vandaag te bellen voor een afspraak.

conversation_flow.title: State your phone number.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Precies. Wat is uw telefoonnummer ook alweer?
